Instructions:
1. Log into Unity/SWB.
2. Navigate to 'Digital Customer Tab'.
3. Enter Sales Order (SO) # in the search field.
4. Click 'Search'.
1. Locate the 'Summary' section of the search results.\n2. Review 'Internal Notes' for any previous agent comments.\n3. Identify the Vendor Name to confirm if it is a 3rd party or standard vendor.
1. Locate 'Internal Tracking' field.\n2. Identify 'Delivery ID' (DID) for warehouse communication.\n3. Verify if DID is linked to a valid carrier.
1. Copy the Order Confirmation Number.\n2. Paste into Salesforce Global Search.\n3. Filter results by 'Cases'.

1. Check for open cases with subjects like 'Order Status' or 'Alert'.\n2. Review 'Case Owner'.\n3. If OMT or another Support Agent is assigned, do not open a new task; add a comment to the existing case instead.

1. Trigger: Message 'Sales Order Quantity Change is not allowed as the PO is either received or Invoiced'.\n2. Action: Email delink_and_rematch_invoices@arrow.com.\n3. Include: WEB-SO, PO Number, Invoice attachment, and specific reason for amendment.
1. Wait for confirmation from Delink Team.\n2. Process the necessary amendment in Oracle/Unity.\n3. Inform Delink Team once complete so the order can be re-billed and closed.
Rationale: Closing the financial loop after amendment.

Instructions: If PO has a linked ASN or is already received, a quantity change is blocked. You must follow the 'Delink' process first.
1. Identify BOM (Bill of Materials) lines in Oracle.\n2. Ensure all sub-components are available before attempting to release or amend parent line.
1. Identify Hazmat flags in item master.\n2. Logic: Requires specific shipping methods and warehouse certifications. Do not override automated carrier selection.
Rationale: Safety and compliance for hazardous goods.

Instructions: 1. Verify if parts were physically missing from box.\n2. Check WMS 'Short Pick' logs.\n3. If verified, process credit and replacement SO.
1. Request customer to return extra parts or process a bill-only SO.\n2. If return: provide RMA and prepaid label.
1. In Digital Customer Tab, click the specific order line.\n2. A side panel opens on the right.\n3. Scroll to 'OMT Action Notes'.
OMT Action Notes contain specific vetting requirements. Note: Warehouse agents cannot override these holds.
Rationale: Chain of command for alert release.

Instructions: Trigger: Unit price is below cost or margin. Status: 'Price Release Alert'. Requires OMT & Asset Manager approval.
Trigger: Order exceeds dollar threshold. Status: 'High Value Alert'. Requires OMT manual vetting.
Trigger: Aggregate order value is high. May require Credit Dept review in addition to OMT.
1. Open 'My Customer' screen.\n2. Search for the account.\n3. Check 'Core Acct' for 'Manual Hold' flags.
1. Compare 'Bill-to' address in Unity with 'Ship-to' address.\n2. If mismatch is found, do not release alert; flag for OMT vetting.
1. Go to Customer Sales > Line of Credit.\n2. Confirm status is 'YES'.\n3. Check CMF (Customer Master File) for valid credit certificate.
1. If certificate is present, navigate to LOC section.\n2. Click %manager%.\n3. Click 'Apply' to link credit to order.
1. Go to Customer Sales > Line of Credit.\n2. Confirm status is 'NO'.\n3. Send 'TERMSINFO' canned email to customer.
After sending 'TERMSINFO' email, create a Salesforce Task with a 48-hour reminder to follow up on payment.

1. ETQ Portal > Warehouse Requests.
2. Select 'Sure Ship Domestic'.
3. Set Status to 'Draft'.
4. Select Whse: V72. Host: AC Prod.
Use only if order is in 'Released' status for more than 48 hours without tracking.
Enter: 'Please arrange shipment for DID [NUMBER] provided. Order has been in Picked/Released status since [DATE].'
1. ETQ Portal > 'Sure Ship International'.\n2. Use for international orders at Reno Cross-dock.
Use Sure Ship International when order is 'Shipped' in Unity but tracking is blank for >24 hours.
1. ETQ Portal > 'Receiving Expedite'.\n2. Select Warehouse V72.
Must provide: Supplier PO#, Carrier, Tracking#, and Date of Arrival at Reno.
If DHL tracking says 'Signed By' but the name is unreadable/missing, you MUST type 'N/A' in the ETQ field to allow submission.
Send urgent receiving requests to: URGENTRECEIVING.HK@arrowasia.com.
Subject: URGENT RECEIVING - SO [NUMBER]\nBody: Include Supplier PO, Tracking, Carrier, MPN, and Qty.
Email: ecommerce.dlc.emea@arrow.com AND Helpdeskvenlo.dlc.emea@arrow.com.
Email: business.support.pdc.emea@arrow.com.
1. Receive 'DROPSHIP REPORT' from AP.\n2. Open the excel attachment and locate items with missing approvals.
Determine: Why did the supplier ship parts without OMT/Unity approval?
Rationale: Root cause analysis for billing errors.

Instructions: Determine: Can we obtain a credit memo from the supplier to cancel out the unapproved shipment?
If payment to supplier is disputed, escalate to Ruth to check 'Contract Legal' terms.
Determine: Do we need to charge the customer for the parts they received? (Train OMT to get confirmation).
1. Create a new Sales Order (SO) in Unity.\n2. Copy all header/line info from the original SO.
The 'MFR' field must be updated to the 3rd Party Supplier code (e.g., MOLEX_WAL).
Set Unit Resale to $0.00.
Manually remove all freight charges from the replacement SO lines.
Immediately apply a Manual Header Hold after booking the order.
Hold Comment: 'Replacement SO; reaching out to [SUPPLIER] for PO Cancellation'.
Rationale: Informing other agents of SO status.

Instructions: Wait exactly 30 minutes after booking for the system to generate the new Dropship PO# (located in Info > Drop Ship).
Email: delink and rematch invoices@arrow.com.
You MUST CC Sophia Ciarlo on all rematch and cancellation emails.
Subject: Dropship Order D[NUMBER] - Please confirm receipt\nBody: 'Hello - Please confirm receipt of replacement Dropship Order D[NUMBER] to pay [SUPPLIER] for Invoice #[NUMBER].'
Contact: Kelly Anderson (Kellys@waldom.com). CC Sophia Ciarlo.
Contact: Lauren Buckley (LBuckley@airelectro.com). CC Sophia Ciarlo.
Subject: URGENT: Dropship Order D[NUMBER] - Please cancel\nBody: 'Hello - Please proceed to cancel the below PO on your side and confirm: PO#[NUMBER] ([QTY] pcs/PN [PART]/Customer: [NAME]).'
Do not email PEI Genesis. Use Microsoft Teams channel: 'PEI Genesis / PO's to be cancelled'.
Provide 5 replacement Dropship POs to cancel on a daily basis (Active window: 10/16/24-10/21/24).
Select: 'Warehouse IT Support - WMS'. Use for Packing list reprints or printer failures.
Use the 'Digital Business Operations Request Form' for internal status changes.
Select: 'Report a Digital Issue'. Provide URL, Screenshot, and WEB-SO.
Procedure for users unable to log in: Check MyConnect for 'Blocked User Status' requests.
Link: https://wms-prod.arrow.com/PAWMSReprints/. Use for VXX warehouses.
Link: https://arrow.tfaforms.net/4865283. Refer to 'Reno COC.docx'.
Link: arrowcrm.my.salesforce-sites.com/arrowservices. Applies to: VM5, V37, V38, GN4, V29, V75, V91, V86, VAA, VAN, VAP, VN8.
Email: verical-logistics@verical.com. CC: amunoz@arrow.com, jawells@arrow.com.
Body: 'Could you please provide MFG CoC: WEB-SO: / PO: / Delivery ID#: / MPN: / Line#: / Regards.'
**Alpha**: A, B, T, W, C, H\n**Email**: alexis.flores@arrow.com
**Alpha**: I, J, K, E, F, #, signs, D, Q, U, V, X, Y, Z\n**Email**: iliana.robles@arrow.com
Rationale: Handles Special Chars and Alpha Group I-Z.

Instructions: **Alpha**: L, P, M, N, O, R, G\n**Email**: valeria.sanchez@arrow.com
Lines can be cancelled directly in Unity if they are in 'Entered' status.
1. ETQ > 'Request to Cancel Sales Orders'.\n2. Use for lines that are already 'Released' or 'Picked'.
If order has a Supplier PO, you must contact the supplier/Asset team before cancelling the SO in Unity.
